amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the CDCs Domestic Violence Community Projects by $4.5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 29 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to increase funding for the CDCs Domestic Violence Community Projects.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moore amendment (A029) Agreed to by recorded vote: 348 - 75 (Roll no. 279).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Moore amendment (A029) Agreed to by recorded vote: 348 - 75 (Roll no. 279).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A029) offered by Ms. Moore.
